tool_description: Translate text to 100+ languages. Fast processing, cost saving. Free up to 100,000 characters per month.

api_list.name: translate
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to translate text from one language to another using the POST method.

required_parameters.name: target_language
required_parameters.description: Target language, filled with supported language codes such as: **en**, **eu**, **id**, and many others.

required_parameters.name: source_language
required_parameters.description: Source language, filled with supported language codes such as: **en**, **eu**, **id**, and many others. You can also set the value '**auto**' if you want the API to detect the language automatically.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The field must be filled with text content to be translated, maximum 15,000 characters.
